::Cygnar::
    "Aye, sir."  He walks inside to the command room and looks at the map.  
He points at two bases.  First he points at the Trainer base.  "We've been 
planing an attack against this base."  He points to the Chivtron base on the 
other side of the map.  "This base is unknown to me.  I'll need more 
information before I can plan an attack.

::NeoGuile::
    NeoGuile follows him into the base and the command room without anything 
to do.  He stands in the corner watching.
